document_title: Hearing loss in one ear (unilateral hearing loss): Causes and treatments
subsection_name: nghe-kem-mot-ben-tai.json_4_How to prevent hearing loss in one ear
subsection_content:
Doctor Thuy Hang advises that to prevent hearing loss in one ear, we should pay attention to the following issues.
Avoid noise: Noise environments are the leading cause of hearing loss. Exposure to high-intensity sound also increases the risk of permanent deafness. Protect your ears from infections: Bacteria and viruses that cause otitis media, rhinosinusitis, measles... are the cause of ear infections that can lead to hearing loss, so avoid being infected with these sources. This disease helps protect the ears from the risk of deafness or hearing loss in one ear. Keep ears dry and clean: Keep ears dry and clean by drying ears after swimming or bathing to prevent ear infections that lead to hearing loss.
